info.description:
A service that permits to handle nodoInviaRPT and nodoInviaCarrelloRPT request from WISP, converting them in NMU payments.

**STANDARD ERRORS:**
NAME | CODE | DESCRIPTION
- | - | -
**WIC-500** | *ERROR* |  *...error description...*
**WIC-1000** | *GENERIC_ERROR* | Error while executing conversion flow.  *...error description...*
**WIC-1001** | *PARSING_GENERIC_ERROR* | Error while parsing payload.  *...error description...*
**WIC-1002** | *PARSING_INVALID_HEADER* | Error while parsing payload. The SOAP header in payload is invalid:  *...error description...*
**WIC-1003** | *PARSING_INVALID_BODY* | Error while parsing payload. The SOAP body in payload is invalid:  *...error description...*
**WIC-1004** | *PARSING_INVALID_XML_NODES* | Error while parsing payload. The list of nodes extracted from document must be greater than zero, but currently it is zero.
**WIC-1005** | *PARSING_INVALID_ZIPPED_PAYLOAD* | Error while parsing payload. Cannot unzip payload correctly.
**WIC-1006** | *PARSING_PRIMITIVE_NOT_VALID* | Error while checking primitive. Primitive  [*...content...*] not valid.
**WIC-1100** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_MULTIBENEFICIARY_CART* | Error while generating payment position for GPD service. The cart is defined as multi-beneficiary but there are a number of RPTs lower than 2.
**WIC-1101** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_IBANS* | Error while generating payment position for GPD service. The IBAN field must be set if digital stamp is not defined for the transfer.
**WIC-1102** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_DEBTOR* | Error while generating payment position for GPD service. The debtor subject information is different between the various RPT of the cart.
**WIC-1103** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_CREDITOR_INSTITUTION* | Error while generating payment position for GPD service. The creditor institution information is different between the various RPT of the cart.
**WIC-1104** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_RPT* | Error while generating payment position for GPD service. Cannot extract IUV from passed RPT.
**WIC-1200** | *CONFIGURATION_INVALID_STATION* | Error while generating cart for Checkout service. No valid station found with code  [*...content...*].
**WIC-1201** | *CONFIGURATION_INVALID_STATION_REDIRECT_URL* | Error while generating cart for Checkout service. The station with code  [*...content...*] contains wrong redirect URL and it is not possible to generate valid URI.
**WIC-1202** | *CONFIGURATION_INVALID_CACHE* | Error while reading configuration cache. No valid cached configuration found.
**WIC-1300** | *PAYMENT_POSITION_NOT_IN_PAYABLE_STATE* | Error while generating payment position. One or more of the payment position(s) associated to IUV(s)  [*...content...*] exists but are not in a payable state. All the payments are declared invalid.
**WIC-1301** | *PAYMENT_POSITION_IN_INVALID_STATE* | Error while generating payment position. There is a payment position associated to IUV  [*...content...*] but it is in an invalid state or it corrupted.
**WIC-1301** | *PAYMENT_POSITION_NOT_VALID* | Error while generating payment position. The payment position associated to IUV  [*...content...*] is not valid.
**WIC-2000** | *PERSISTENCE_RPT_NOT_FOUND* | Error while retrieving RPT. RPT with sessionId  [*...content...*] not found.
**WIC-2001** | *PERSISTENCE_REQUESTID_CACHING_ERROR* | Error while reading cached RequestID. No valid value found for key  [*...content...*].
**WIC-2002** | *PERSISTENCE_MAPPING_NAV_TO_IUV_ERROR* | Error while reading cached mapping from NAV to IUV. No valid value found for NAV-based key  [*...content...*].
**WIC-3000** | *CLIENT_APICONFIGCACHE* | Error while communicating with APIConfig cache service.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3001** | *CLIENT_GPD* | Error while communicating with GPD service.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3002** | *CLIENT_IUVGENERATOR* | Error while communicating with IUV Generator service.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3003** | *CLIENT_DECOUPLER_CACHING* | Error while communicating with decoupler caching API.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3004** | *CLIENT_CHECKOUT* | Error while communicating with Checkout service.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3005** | *CLIENT_PAAINVIART* | Error while communicating with Station for paaInviaRT service.  *...error description...*
info.title: WISP Converter

tags.description: Convert sendPaymentResultV2, closePaymentV2 or paSendRTV2 into paaInviaRT to EC
tags.name: Receipt
